descrizione:
ability:Shielded (When you play this unit, give him a Shield token.)
ability:When Played: You may defeat a unit with 4 or less remaining HP.
ability:Ambush ability:When Played: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any number of units with combined cost 3 or less and play each of them for free.

ability:Overwhelm (When attacking an enemy unit, deal excess damage to the opponent's base.)
ability:When Played: Deal 6 damage divided as you choose among enemy units.

ability:Exploit 2
ability:On Attack: If you've attacked with another Separatist unit this phase, this unit gets +3/+0 for this phase.
ability:This unit can attack 2 units instead of 1.
ability:While playing this unit, ignore his aspect penalty if you control Rey. ability:On Attack: Give a unit +2/+0 for this phase. If it's a non- unit, also give an Experience token to it.
ability:If damage would be dealt to attached unit, prevent that damage. If you do, defeat a Shield token on it.

non schierato:
	ability:When you use a "When Defeated" ability: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, use that ability again.
	ability:Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
schierato:
	ability:When you use a "When Defeated" ability: You may  use that ability again. Use this ability only once each round.

non schierato: ability:When you deal non-combat damage: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, deal 1 indirect damage to a player. (That player assigns 1 unpreventable damage among their base and units.) ability:Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, choose one: - Deploy this leader. - Deploy this leader as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle unit without a Pilot on it. schierato: ability:Attached unit is a leader unit. ability:When deployed as an upgrade: Deal up to 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of units.

non schierato: ability:Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, choose one: - Deploy this leader. - Deploy this leader as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle unit without a Pilot on it. schierato: ability:This upgrade can't be defeated by enemy card abilities. ability:Attached unit is a leader unit. If it's a Fighter, it gains: "On Attack: You may deal 3 damage to a unit."
ability:Draw 1 less card in your starting hand.
ability:Your minimum deck size is increased by 10 cards.
ability:Your minimum deck size is decreased by 5 cards.

ability:Shielded (When you play this unit, give him a Shield token.)
ability:The first unit you play each round that has a "When Defeated" ability costs {R1} less.
ability:When Defeated: Heal 2 damage from a base.
ability:On Attack: You may deal damage to a unit equal to the amount of damage on this unit.

ability:When Played: You may use a "When Defeated" ability on another friendly unit.
ability:When Defeated: Create 2 TIE Fighter tokens.

ability:Sentinel (Units in this arena can't attack your non-Sentinel units or your base.)
ability:When Defeated: You may defeat a space unit that costs 3 or less.

ability:Piloting [{R2}] (You may play this as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle without a Pilot.) ability:Attached unit gains: "On Attack: Give an Experience token to this unit, then deal 1 damage to it."
ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:Attached unit gains: "On Attack: Discard a card from the defending player's deck. If that card costs 3 or less, draw a card."
ability:When Played: You may deal 2 damage to this unit. If you do, draw a card.
ability:This unit gets -1/-0 for each damage on it.

ability:Shielded (When you play this unit, give him a Shield token.)
ability:While this unit is defending, the attacker gets -1/-0.
ability:Defeat an enemy space unit with 3 or less remaining HP. If you do and an opponent controls no space units, you may give an Experience token to a unit.

ability:Sentinel (Units in this arena can't attack your non-Sentinel units or your base.) ability:Piloting [{R2}] (You may play this as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle without a Pilot.) ability:Attached unit gains Sentinel.
ability:When Defeated: You may give a unit -1/-1 for this phase.
ability:When Defeated: You may draw a card.
ability:Defeat a non-leader Vehicle unit.
ability:While you control a token unit, this unit gains Raid 1. (It gets +1/+0 while attacking.)
ability:When Played: Create a TIE Fighter token.
ability:Each other friendly space unit gets +1/+1.
ability:When Played/On Attack: You may give another First Order unit +2/+2 for this phase.
ability:This unit gets +1/+0 for each other friendly Pilot unit and upgrade. ability:Piloting [{R1}] ability:Attached unit gets +1/+0 for each other friendly Pilot unit and upgrade.

ability:When Played/When this unit completes an attack (and survives: You may search the top 8 cards of your deck for a Droid unit, reveal it, and draw it. If it costs 2 or less, you may play it for free. (Put the other cards on the bottom of your deck in a random order.)

ability:Ambush (After you play this unit, it may ready and attack an enemy unit.)
ability:When Played: You may pay {R2}. If you do, move this unit to the ground arena and give 2 Experience tokens to it. (It's a ground unit.)

ability:Restore 1
ability:When Played: You may attack with a Pilot unit or a unit with a Pilot on it. It gets +1/+0 and gainsRestore 1 for this attack.

ability:This unit costs {R1} less to play for each friendly Pilot unit and upgrade.
ability:When a Pilot upgrade attaches to this unit: Create an X-Wing token.

ability:When played as a unit/On Attack: The next Resistance card you play this phase costs {R1} less. ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:When played as an upgrade: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Resistance card, reveal it, and draw it.
ability:This unit can't be defeated or returned to hand by enemy card abilities. ability:Piloting [{R3}]

ability:While you control another Resistance card, this unit gains Sentinel.
ability:When Defeated: Deal damage equal to this unit's power to an enemy unit.
ability:When Played: You may put the top card of your deck into play as a resource.
ability:When Played/On Attack: Create an X-Wing token.
ability:Attack with a space unit. If you do, attack with a ground unit, and that ground unit gets +2/+0 for this attack.
ability:Choose an arena. A friendly space unit deals damage equal to its power to each enemy unit in that arena.
ability:On Attack/When Defeated: Deal 1 indirect damage to a player.
ability:When Played: If an opponent controls more space units than you, ready this unit.

ability:Overwhelm
ability:When Played: Deal 1 damage to each of up to 3 units.
ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:Attached unit gains: "On Attack: Deal 2 indirect damage to a player. If this unit is an Underworld unit, deal 3 indirect damage instead."

ability:You assign all indirect damage you deal to opponents.
ability:When Played: Deal 4 indirect damage to each opponent.
ability:Piloting [{R2}]
ability:Deal damage to a non-leader unit equal to 1 less than its remaining HP.
ability:Piloting [{R1}] (You may play this as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle without a Pilot.) ability:When played as an upgrade: You may pay {R2}. If you do, ready a Resistance unit.
ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:When played as an upgrade: You may defeat an upgrade that costs 2 or less.
ability:On Attack: Deal 3 indirect damage to the defending player. They assign 3 unpreventable damage among their base and units.
ability:Piloting [{R1}] ability:If attached unit is a Fighter, it gains Overwhelm. ability:If attached unit is a Transport, it gets +0/+1. ability:If attached unit is a Speeder, it gains Grit.
ability:On Attack: You may deal 2 damage to a damaged unit.

ability:On Attack: Deal indirect damage equal to this unit's power to the defending player. If a base is damaged this way, draw a card.(That player assigns that much unpreventable damage among their base and units.)

ability:Attack with a Fighter unit. For this attack, it gets +4/+0 and gains: "On Attack: Discard 2 cards from the defending player's deck. Deal unpreventable damage equal to the difference in the discarded cards' costs to this unit."

ability:Overwhelm
ability:When Played/When Defeated: Choose a player. They discard a card from their hand. Then, if they have more cards in their hand than you, they discard a card from their hand.
ability:Each friendly Vehicle unit gets +1/+0 and Overwhelm. (When attacking an enemy unit, deal excess damage to the opponent's base.)
ability:When Defeated: Deal 3 indirect damage to a player. (They assign 3 unpreventable damage among their base and units.)
ability:Indirect damage you deal to opponents is increased by 1.
ability:Choose a friendly unit and an enemy unit in the same arena. If you do, deal 3 damage to each of them.
ability:Ready a Fighter or Transport unit with 6 or less power.
ability:Deal 8 indirect damage to a player. If you control a Capital Ship unit, deal 12 indirect damage instead.
ability:This unit doesn't ready during the regroup phase unless its power is 4 or more.
ability:While attacking an exhausted unit that didn't enter play this phase, this unit deals combat damage before the defender.
ability:On Attack: If you played a Bounty Hunter or Pilot card this phase, you may draw a card.{/P}

ability:On Attack: Exhaust the defender and deal 1 damage to it (if it's a unit). ability:Piloting [{R2} ] ability:Attached unit gains: "On Attack: Exhaust the defender and deal 1 damage to it (if it's a unit).
ability:When this unit deal combat damage to an opponent's base: Each unit that opponent plays this phase costs {R1} more.
ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:When played as an upgrade: You may deal 1 damage to a unit. If attached unit is a Transport, you may deal 2 damage instead.
ability:Attack with a Vehicle unit. Prevent all damage that would be deal to it during this attack.
ability:Piloting [{R1}]
ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:When attached unit completed an attack: You may return this upgrade to its owner's hand.
ability:When Played: If another player controls 3 or more exhausted units, give a Shield token to a unit.
ability:On Attack: Discard a card from your deck. If it has an odd cost, you may give an Experience token to another unit.
ability:When you play an upgrade on this unit: You may attack with this unit. It gets +1/+0 for this attack.
ability:When Played: An opponent discards a card from their hand. If it's a unit, you may exhaust a unit.
ability:Ambush ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:When played as an upgrade: You may attack with attached unit. If it's the Millennium Falcon, it deals its combat damage before the defender.

ability:If an opponent controls 3 or more space units, this unit costs {R3} less to play.
ability:Ambush
ability:Discard 3 cards from an opponent's deck and 3 cards from your deck. Deal damage to a unit equal to the number of cards with an odd cost discarded this way.
ability:When played as a unit: Exhaust up to 2 ground units. ability:Piloting [{R2}] ability:When played as an upgrade: Exhaust an enemy unit in this arena.
ability:Raid 1 ability:Piloting [{R1}] You may play this as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle without a Pilot. ability:Attached unit gains Raid 1.

ability:Piloting [{R2}] (You may play this as an upgrade on a friendly Vehicle without a Pilot.) ability:When played as an upgrade: Discard 2 cards from your deck. Return each of those cards with an odd cost to your hand.
ability:When Played: If you control another space unit, you may exhaust a unit.

ability:Each enemy non-leader unit gets -1/-0 for each damage on it.
ability:When Played: Deal 5 indirect damage to a player.
ability:Deal 2 damage to a Droid or Vehicle unit and exhaust it.
ability:Take control of a non-leader Vehicle unit that costs 6 or less without a Pilot on it. If you do, ready it. At the start of the next regroup phase, return that unit to its owner's hand.
ability:On Attack: Deal 3 indirect damage to the defending player. (They assign 3 unpreventable damage among their base and units.)

ability:When Played/On Attack: Deal 1 indirect damage to a player. If you control Boba Fett (as a unit, upgrade, or leader), deal 2 indirect damage instead. (They assign unpreventable damage among their base and units.)
